description: Originally used as a reward given by a person of high status to a person of low status. Nowadays, it is mostly used to mean online tipping/donations. 「Toubi」 (投币) has the same meaning. 「Zhibo dashang」 (直播打赏) means 「tipping in live streaming」.

examples.chinese: 我刚打赏了5.00元,略表心意
examples.translation: I just tipped 5.00 yuan, a small token of appreciation.

examples.chinese: 我刚打赏了1元,很喜欢作者
examples.translation: I just tipped 1 yuan, I really like the author.

examples.chinese: 我爱看网络直播,频频给主播打赏
examples.translation: I love watching online live streams and frequently tip the streamers.
